Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: These results support the conclusion that NO plays a role of endogenous convulsant in rat model of lindane seizures .

Let's think step by step.

1. NO (Nitric Oxide) - This is a chemical compound that is identified as an endogenous convulsant in the context of the paragraph. An endogenous substance is one that is produced naturally in the body. A convulsant is a substance that causes convulsions or seizures. Therefore, NO is the chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Chemical.
NO (Nitric Oxide) - This is the chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph that plays a role as an endogenous convulsant in rat model of lindane seizures.
